base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Sites
template.template_md:
{% block content %} {% for item in data_sources.allFieldsSites %} {% endfor %}
id created_by created_time modified_by modified_time client_id name block_policy_inheritance failing_checks failing_checks.error failing_checks.warning workstation_policy_id server_policy_id alert_template_id
{{ item.id }} {{ item.created_by }} {{ item.created_time }} {{ item.modified_by }} {{ item.modified_time }} {{ item.client_id }} {{ item.name }} {{ item.block_policy_inheritance }} {{ item.failing_checks }} {{ item.failing_checks.error }} {{ item.failing_checks.warning }} {{ item.workstation_policy_id }} {{ item.server_policy_id }} {{ item.alert_template_id }}
{% endblock %}
